Package classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicFidelityCard
    This class handles the special offers.
    BirthdayOffer
    This class handles the birthday offers, from the notification to the discount in itself.
    Client
    This class represents the clients of the restaurant.
    CLUI
    This class handles the Command Line User Interface of the Enjoy Your Meal System.
    EYMS
    This class is the one containing all the methods that will be called by the Command Line User Interface.
    LotteryFidelityCard
    This class represents the lottery fidelity card.
    Meal
    This class represents the meals that are on offer in the restaurant.
    Order
    The order class represents a list of meals that the client might order in the restaurant.
    PointFidelityCard
    This class represents the point fidelity card.
    User
    This class is the superclass for the Client class and can represent both a client or a chef.
